subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Baylor, which plays Oklahoma State, is 9-0 for the first time and in the running for its first outright Big 12 Conference title since 1980 when Mike Singletary was playing linebacker.
snippet: Baylor, which plays Oklahoma State, is 9-0 for the first time and in the running for its first outright Big 12 Conference title since 1980 when Mike Singletary was playing linebacker.
